Headline: #148 Clarendon/Michigan Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clarendon/Lawrence
ShortDescription: Southbound 148 Clarendon/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Marine Drive, Wilson and Clarendon: due to street blockage near Clarendon/Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #148 Clarendon/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Marine Drive, Wilson, Clarendon and over regular route, due to street blockage near Clarendon/Lawrence.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 74th/Ashland

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Ashland, 76th, Damen and the Terminal: due to street blockage near 74th/Ashland.
